data.quote: Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
data.author: Carroll Bryant

data.quote: It wasn’t love at first sight. It took a full five minutes.
data.author: Lucille Ball

data.quote: A hug is like a boomerang: you get it back right away.
data.author: Bil Keane

data.quote: Maybe you don’t need the whole world to love you, you know. Maybe you just need one person.
data.author: Kermit the Frog

data.quote: Love is like Pi: natural, irrational, and very important.
data.author: Lisa Hoffman

data.quote: I love you” begins by I, but it ends up by you.
data.author: Charles de Leusse

data.quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: You can’t blame gravity for falling in love.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: It’s easy to fall in love. The hard part is finding someone to catch you.
data.author: Bertrand Russell

data.quote: True love stories never have endings.
data.author: Richard Bach
